overview: A stressed-out Stephen is running late to see his daughter when Sarah, a girl reported in his paper as "missing", sits next to him on the bus home. When she departs Stephen decides to report her appearance to the missing hotline – but discovers that Sarah has stolen his phone. Angry, he rushes off the bus to confront her. Despite being caught red-handed Sarah denies her crime. Will Stephen’s revelation that she is "missing" cause her to reconsider?
title: Missing
